text:
Title: Consent - Part One: Clean Island

Translation: Persona: Sulli, Persona 2, Dear Jinri

Year: 2023

Country: South Korea

Language: Korean

Runtime: 129 minutes

Director: Su-Ah Hwang, Jun-suk Jung, Ji-hye Kim

Starring: Seol-ri Choi (Sulli)

Introduction:

Documentary "Consent - Part One: Clean Island" was initially planned as a series of short films directed by five directors, featuring Sulli in each part. However, she passed away during the production of the second piece, leaving only "Clean Island" completed among the initial lineup. Part Two, titled "Consent", is a full-length documentary composed primarily of deep interviews with Sulli. Four years since her last appearance, audiences will hear sincere reflections from the late 25-year-old artist. The title refers to Sulli's birth name, 'Choi Jinri', meaning "truth." She yearned for people to accept and appreciate her genuine self throughout her life.
